name: ThrombosesAtUnusualSitesDiagnosisCodesForAEReporting
title: Thromboses at unusual sites, diagnosis codes for AE reporting
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Thromboses at unusual sites definition of diagnosis codes, for potential identification of potential biologics-related adverse events.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element in the QDM category of Condition/Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Thromboses at unusual sites ICD10CM and equivalent SNOMED diagnosis codes. This includes intracranial and intraabdominal thromboses.),(Exclusion Criteria: Sequelae and chronic codes may be excluded.)
